docs.title: Enum4linux to check all OSINT info
#SMB enumeration
docs.text:
List shares 

smbclient -L //IP

Enter share 

smbclient //IP/Share -U user

Impacket

impacket-smbclient -k scrm.local/ksimpson:ksimpson@DC1.scrm.local

[!abstract] -k: Use Kerberos authentication - scrm.local/ksimpson:ksimpson: Domain and credentials

  • @DC1.scrm.local`: Target FQDN

docs.title: LDAPSearch to find all Kerberoastable accounts
